DOC.brief_summary: In randomize multicentric phase II study investigate whether accelerated postoperative radiotherapy ( 7 fraction per week , 2 Gy single dose ) may improve locoregional tumour control non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) comparison conventional fractionation ( 5 fraction per week , 2 Gy single dose ) .
DOC.brief_title: Postoperative Radiotherapy Non-small Cell Lung Cancer : Accelerated v . Conventional Fractionation
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize multicentric trial . Within study accelerate irradiation schedule ( 7 fraction per week , 2 Gy single dose ) compare currently use conventional fractionation schedule ( 5 fraction per week , 2 Gy single dose ) postoperative radiotherapy patient NSCLC . The primary endpoint locoregional tumour control 36 month . Secondary endpoint overall survival patient , local recurrence-free distant metastases-free survival 36 month , acute late toxicity well quality life treatment method .
